name: The Ship: Full Steam Ahead
blurb: The Ship: Full Steam Ahead will be a steampunk sequel to the popular 1920's-themed computer game, The Ship.

rewards.reward: PLEDGE LEVEL: +++ STEAM ENTHUSIAST +++. You will receive: Our heartfelt thanks for investing! Every pound will help us to make this project a reality.

PLEDGE LEVEL: +++ CITIZEN OF THE EMPIRE +++. In addition to the above rewards, you will receive:
 
WALLPAPER (Exclusive, hi-res backgrounds for your desktop, iPad or mobile devices) +
 
AVATAR IMAGES (images of game characters for use as blog avatars, etc.)

PLEDGE LEVEL: +++ SHIP\u2019S ENGINEER +++ In addition to the above rewards, you will receive: A COPY OF THE SHIP: FULL STEAM AHEAD (a copy of the game or its equivalent in paid downloadable content) + KICKSTARTER ITEM: the unique in-game item for Kickstarter backers.

PLEDGE LEVEL: +++ COLONIAL EXPLORER +++
In addition to the above rewards, you will receive:
A COPY OF THE SHIP: FULL STEAM AHEAD: (a copy of the game or its equivalent in paid downloadable content) +
FREE COPIES OF THE ORIGINAL SHIP GAME (you’ll get *five* copies -- one for you, two for your friends, and two for their friends). + WEB CREDITS (get your name on the The Ship’s VIP Passenger List -- our web list reserved for special contributors). + RSFPS LETTER OF MEMBERSHIP (Letter of membership for the ‘Royal Society for the Proliferation of Steam’).

PLEDGE LEVEL: +++ COLONIAL EXPLORER +++ In addition to the above rewards, you will receive: FREE COPIES OF THE ORIGINAL SHIP GAME (you\u2019ll get *five* copies -- one for you, two for your friends, and two for their friends). + WEB CREDITS (get your name on the The Ship\u2019s VIP Passenger List -- our web list reserved for special contributors). + RSFPS LETTER OF MEMBERSHIP (Letter of membership for the \u2018Royal Society for the Proliferation of Steam\u2019).

PLEDGE LEVEL: +++ CRYPTO CARTOGRAPHER +++ In addition to the above rewards, you will receive: BETA ACCESS (Enter Full Steam Ahead during the later periods of development and experience new features before they are officially released. Put in your tuppence-worth. Help us polish our solid Beta and Pre-alpha work. Exact date TBA) + DIGITAL MAP (a high-quality, digital map, including our most artful deck plans and duplicitous game secrets) + CRYPTO PROMO CODE (a selection of downloadable game content for you and a friend).

PLEDGE LEVEL: +++ AERIAL BUCCANEER +++ In addition to the above rewards, you will receive: BUCCANEER PROMO CODE (a selection of downloadable game content for you and three friends. Each promo code includes a top-tier item) + SHORT STORY COMPENDIUM (an E-book compendium of short stories set in the new Full Steam Ahead background).

PLEDGE LEVEL: +++ AGENT OF THE IMPERIAL SECRET SERVICE +++
 
In addition to the above rewards, you will receive:

A COPY OF THE SHIP: FULL STEAM AHEAD: (a copy of the game or its equivalent in paid downloadable content) +

POSTER MAP (a high-quality, printed map, including our most artful deck plans and duplicitous game secrets) +
  
FSA STICKERS (a selection of Full Steam Ahead sticky stuff) + 
 
PIN-BADGE (the official 'Full Steam Ahead' pin-badge) + 

BETA ACCESS (Enter Full Steam Ahead during the later periods of development and experience new features before they are officially released. Put in your tuppence-worth. Help us polish our solid Beta and Pre-alpha work. Exact date TBA -- delivered earlier than rest of items).

PLEDGE LEVEL: +++ PROFESSOR OF CHRONOZOOLOGY +++
 
In addition to the above rewards, you will receive:
 
EMBROIDERED PATCH (an embroidered patch from a ship of the fleet) +

CONCEPT ART E-BOOK (a digital version of our most splendiferous concept art book) + 

SOUNDTRACK (MP3's from or inspired by our steampunk soundtrack) +
 
ALPHA ACCESS (As for Beta Access, but enter Full Steam Ahead during the intermediate periods of development. Put in your shilling’s-worth. Help us build on our Pre-alpha awesomeness. Exact date TBA -- delivered earlier than rest of items).

PLEDGE LEVEL: +++ CURATOR OF ATLANTEAN ANTIQUITIES +++
 
In addition to the above rewards, you will receive:
 
T-SHIRT (the 'Full Steam Ahead' T-shirt) +

CUFF-LINKS / BROOCH (your choice of steampunk cuff-links or a steampunk brooch. The irony of providing cuff-links with a t-shirt is not at all lost on us...) +  
 
IN-GAME CREDITS (get your name featured on the in-game credits) + 

PRE-ALPHA ACCESS (As for Beta and Alpha access, but enter Full Steam Ahead during the early periods of development. Put in your sovereign’s-worth. Help us define this game. Exact date TBA -- delivered earlier than rest of items).

PLEDGE LEVEL: +++ OFFICER ON HER MAJESTY’S DIRIGIBLE, REDOUBTABLE +++
 
In addition to the above rewards, you will receive:
 
TICKETS (a framed pair of facsimile tickets for one of the ships in the game) +
 
LIMITED EDITION CHARACTER MODEL (a numbered, strictly limited-edition, character model of a steampunked MR X – a proper collector’s item)

PLEDGE LEVEL: +++ HER MAJESTY’S SPECIAL ENVOY +++
 
In addition to the above rewards, you will receive:
 
YOUR NAME ON A GAME CHARACTER (your name -- or the name of a friend / family member / fictitious person of your choosing -- will feature on an in-game character. [Subject to approval]) +
  
CONCEPT ART BOOK (a limited edition copy of the concept art book signed by the team).

PLEDGE LEVEL: +++ VICE REGENT OF THE MARTIAN COLONIES +++
 
In addition to the above rewards, you will receive:
 
UNIQUE GAME ITEM (a uniquely modelled game item, with its own special ‘history’, just for you) +
 
YOUR LIKENESS (A likeness of you (or a friend / family member of your choosing) will be featured in the game as a passenger, captain or game character) +
 
AN HONEST-TO-GOD RAYGUN (a reproduction raygun designed by our art team and delivered straight to your door).

PLEDGE LEVEL: +++ COLLABORATOR +++

In addition to the above rewards, you will receive:

A JOURNEY TO THE CENTRE OF THE E… EDINBURGH (a return flight for two from anywhere in the world to Edinburgh, Scotland. Three night’s accommodation in the city, and a VIP invite to the Full Steam Ahead launch party. Meet the team. Schmooze. In the event of Martian invasion, feel free to fricassee stuff with your raygun).
